title: skript插件的一点小问题
txt_content:
我想实现这样一个功能：
每十秒钟：
player has permission "hero.Arthur"
heal player by 0.5 hearts

使用“every 10 seconds”事件并不能成功实现，我应该怎么办？

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
every 10 seconds:
    loop all players:
        loop-player has the permission "hero.Arthur"
        heal the loop-player by 5 hearts

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
every 10 seconds:
    player has permission "hero.Arthur"
    heal the player by 5 hearts

浅念哥 发表于 2017-4-2 13:43
every 10 seconds:
    player has permission "hero.Arthur"
    heal the player by 5 hearts
这是不行的。
